spell.wizards.arcane_missile.name: Arcane Missile
spell.wizards.arcane_missile.description: Shoots a bolt of energy, causing {damage} arcane spell damage.
spell.wizards.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.wizards.arcane_blast.description: Blasts the target, causing {damage} arcane damage. Grants Arcane Power, stacking up to {effect_amplifier} times.
spell.wizards.arcane_beam.name: Arcane Beam
spell.wizards.arcane_beam.description: Channels a beam of energy, dealing {damage} arcane damage every second. Consumes Arcane Power.
spell.wizards.fireball.name: Fireball
spell.wizards.fireball.description: Launches a ball of fire, causing {damage} fire spell damage.
spell.wizards.fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
spell.wizards.fire_breath.description: Incinerates targets in front, dealing up to {damage} fire spell damage every second.
spell.wizards.fire_meteor.name: Meteor
spell.wizards.fire_meteor.description: Crashes a meteor on the target, causing up to {damage} fire spell damage within {impact_range} blocks.
spell.wizards.frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
spell.wizards.frostbolt.description: Launches a ball of frost, causing {damage} frost spell damage and slowing the target on impact.
spell.wizards.frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
spell.wizards.frost_nova.description: Freezes targets around you for {effect_duration} seconds, causing {damage} frost spell damage and blocking their movement. Frozen targets are vulnerable to frost magic.
spell.wizards.frost_shield.name: Frost Shield
spell.wizards.frost_shield.description: Protects you from attacks, projectiles and fire for {effect_duration} seconds, but also slows down your movement.
